title: WATCH: CA home provides epic Halloween light show
text:
WATCH: CA home provides epic Halloween light show The popular pumpkin faces are singing again this Halloween and yet again it is drawing big crowds. Join the Conversation To find out more about Facebook commenting please read the Conversation Guidelines and FAQs WATCH: CA home provides epic Halloween light show 10 News Staff, WTSP 12:17 p.m. EDT October 26, 2015 Halloween house CONNECT 3 TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
RIVERSIDE, CA â€” The popular pumpkin faces are singing again this Halloween and yet again it is drawing big crowds. 
The house is in the Orangecrest neighborhood and is covered in a maze of lights and wires. This house is so popular, that people are even staking out spots to see it light up. 
Every year this house is known for thousands of LED lights, strobs and new this year, LCD screens. Read or Share this story: http://on.wtsp.com/1N2zZKh More Stories
